text: Brownstone Productions is an American film and television production company. It was founded by actress, director and producer Elizabeth Banks and Max Handelman. It is known for producing films in the Pitch Perfect franchise, Charlie's Angels (2019) and Cocaine Bear (2023). was founded in October 2002 in Santa Clarita, California, U.S. Category:American entertainment companies Category:2002 establishments in the United States
title: Brownstone Productions
